text:
Gin Lane | Full Time | Local (New York, NY)

------------------------------------------------------

Gin Lane is a collective of creative technologists working on creating future experiences.

We're looking for a frontend-inclined Senior Javascript Engineer to work with us on building out engaging interfaces and future-facing stacks.

If you're working with any combination of React, JS/CSS Animations, Rx, ClojureScript or Elm let's talk!

------------------------------------------------------

Site : http://ginlane.com Email : tech-jobs@ginlane.com Full Description : https://boards.greenhouse.io/ginlane
